## DHeap.childIndex() method

Returns index of 1st child or -1 if `idx < 0`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static childIndex(idx: number, d?: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  idx | <code>number</code> | index |
|  d | <code>number</code> | branch factor |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`
